scripts.go: npm run fe:build && npm run start
scripts.hc:pack-paperz: hc dna pack happs/paperz && hc app pack happs/paperz
scripts.hc:pack-hub: hc dna pack happs/hub && hc app pack happs/hub
scripts.hc:run-paperz: hc sandbox generate happs/paperz && hc sandbox -f=9000 run -l -p 9999
scripts.hc:run-hub: hc sandbox generate happs/hub && hc sandbox -f=8000 run -l -p 8888
scripts.hc:redo-paperz: npm run hc:build-paperz && npm run hc:pack-paperz && npm run hc:run-paperz
scripts.hc:redo-hub: npm run hc:build-hub && npm run hc:pack-hub && npm run hc:run-hub
